ygData.subject: Trading Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: The other day in Kelethin a level 6 bard twink offered to buy every piece of lambent armor I was wearing ( I have complete set minus 2 pieces).  He offered me
ygData.messageBody:
The other day in Kelethin a level 6 bard twink offered to buy every piece of
lambent armor I was wearing ( I have complete set minus 2 pieces). He offered
me a helluva lot of money for it all. I laughed in his face. Told him that I
had been working on completing the quests ever since they came out in the patch.
No way was I gonna sell it and do the quests all over again. He bumped his
offer by 1000PP. Put him on the /ignore list.

Last night was running through EC on my way to Solusek Temple to complete the
lambent breastplate quest. Someone was auctioning a lambent breastplate for
sell. Sent him a /tell that I was interested in knowing his asking price. He
said 3000-5000 PP or items of equal trade. Also told me that he had already sold
three breastplates for that price. I would have thought that they sold for no
more than 1000PP. Only cost me 270PP to buy the two rubies. Guess these newbie
bard twinks have a lot of money to throw around.

Galtin of E'ci
30 bard

> The wizard no doubt has a L5 bard he's ready to twink up. Everyone wants to
> play a bard now, it seems. Same thing is happening on Innoruuk, lots of
> Lambent buyers who have twinks.
>
